name: Redi-Tag, RTG31000, Permanent Stick Write-On Index Tabs, 104 / Pack , White
short_description: Divider Tabs let you create quality indexes; tabs are an easy, visual way to keep your work organized; customizable tabs let you create your own sections and subjects
Adhesive Write-On Tabs save you time and help you locate information quickly and easily; Divider tabs are durable, and don't tear or curl; strong adhesive sees to it that your tabs stay put
Write-On Tabs see to it that your work always looks organized and professional, and give your presentations and reports a polished appearance
Index tabs also let you divide your documents, manuals, books and more into multiple sections to easily divide and conquer your work; label with ballpoint pen, pencil or permanent marker
Write-on index tabs come with 104 tabs per pack; white; tab size: 7/16 x 1 inch
product_description: These Redi-Tag Write-On Index Tabs let you create your own professional-quality indexes. Index tabs give you an easy, visual way to organize and keep track of your work. Customizable tabs let you create your own topics, categories and subjects, adding ease and clarity to any document, textbook or presentation. Also, tab dividers are a time-saver, helping you locate information when and where you need it, quickly and easily. Made from heavy-duty, durable plastic, these tabs don't tear or curl, and the self-stick permanent adhesive sees to it that your tabs stay put. Your work will always look professional and organized, and these divider tabs will give any presentation or report a polished look. Write with ballpoint pen, pencil or permanent marker directly on your tabs to keep track of your work. Also, tabs don't add much bulk when in place, unlike most divider tabs, and won't weigh down your work. Plus, these divider tabs are the ideal size, making them simple to write and identify at a glance. Tab size: 7/16" x 1". Write-On Tabs come with 104 tabs per pack. White.

product_description: Avery Margin Ultra Tabs offer a narrow body that fits within the margins of books, notebooks and printed documents without interfering with text. This makes indexing, flagging and referencing documents quick and easy. The durable tabs are writable on both sides and the adhesive body is clear so you can see text underneath. You can write on these page tabs with most pens, pencils, markers and highlighters, and they're smudge free.* These repositionable tabs stick securely, but remove easily without leaving any residue or lifting ink. Perfect for home organization; use these sticky tabs as page flags in magazines, bible tabs for passages or recipe index tabs in cookbooks. Students, teachers and administrators will find it easy to highlight textbooks and notes without marking the pages. At the office, make quick and easy sticky notes in your weekly or monthly planner and mark items in a report or presentation for referencing, follow up or signatures.*Ink dry times may vary. Tab may lift some inks. Test before applying. The pack of 24 includes 6 pink, 6 green, 6 orange and 6 yellow neon colored tabs.
